title: At Least 134 Dead With Yet Another Failure in Indiaâ€™s Infrastructure
description: After the deaths of at least 134 pedestrians, the country is asking why its infrastructure has failed so calamitously once again.
dc:creator: Sameer Yasir, Suhasini Raj, Hari Kumar and Emily Schmall
media:description: Rescuers on Monday continued to search the Machchhu River in Morbi, India. The bridge that collapsed had recently reopened after seven months of repairs.
